In the digital age where tools shape the way we think and work, my software choices reflect precision, curiosity, and a focus on reproducible research. Every project I undertake is supported by a curated suite of tools that accelerate productivity and improve reliability. This page documents the ecosystem that powers my research, development, writing, teaching, and content creation.

## Machine Learning & AI Development

### Deep Learning Frameworks
- [**PyTorch**](https://pytorch.org/) — Primary framework for deep learning research.
- [**TensorFlow**](https://www.tensorflow.org/) — Alternative ML framework.
- [**PyTorch Lightning**](https://lightning.ai/docs/pytorch/stable/) — Structured training framework.
- [**Hugging Face Transformers**](https://huggingface.co/transformers/) — NLP and transformer models.

### Python Ecosystem
- [**Python 3.x**](https://www.python.org/) — Core programming language.
- [**Jupyter Notebook**](https://jupyter.org/) — Interactive experiments.
- [**Google Colab**](https://colab.research.google.com/) — Cloud-based GPU environment.

### Configuration & Versioning
- [**Hydra**](https://hydra.cc/) — Experiment configuration management.
- [**Data Version Control (DVC)**](https://dvc.org/) — Data and model versioning; pipeline automation.
- [**TensorBoard**](https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard) — Training visualization.

## Development Environment

### Code Editors & IDEs
- [**VS Code**](https://code.visualstudio.com/) — Primary development environment.
- [**RStudio**](https://posit.co/products/open-source/rstudio/) — IDE for R.
- [**Doom Emacs**](https://github.com/doomemacs/doomemacs) — Advanced text editing.
- [**Notepad++**](https://notepad-plus-plus.org/) — Quick text editing.

### Environment Management
- [**Conda**](https://docs.conda.io/) / [**Micromamba**](https://mamba.readthedocs.io/) — Package and environment management.
- [**Lightning-Hydra Template**](https://github.com/ashleve/lightning-hydra-template) — Structured ML experimentation template.

### Terminal & Shell
- [**Windows Terminal**](https://learn.microsoft.com/windows/terminal/) — Modern terminal environment.
- [**PowerShell**](https://learn.microsoft.com/powershell/) — Windows scripting.
- [**WSL2**](https://learn.microsoft.com/windows/wsl/) — Linux subsystem (Ubuntu) on Windows.

## Research & Academic Writing

### Literature Management
- [**Zotero**](https://www.zotero.org/) + [**BetterBibTeX**](https://retorque.re/zotero-better-bibtex/) — Citation and reference management.
- [**Google Scholar**](https://scholar.google.com/) — Literature search.
- [**ORCID**](https://orcid.org/) / [**Scopus**](https://www.scopus.com/) / [**ResearchGate**](https://www.researchgate.net/) — Academic profiles.

### Document Preparation
- [**Quarto**](https://quarto.org/) — Presentations, documentation, thesis, SLR writing.
- [**LaTeX**](https://www.latex-project.org/) — Technical typesetting (including custom MANIT classes).
- [**Pandoc**](https://pandoc.org/) — Universal document converter.
- **Markdown** — Lightweight documentation.
- [**TinyTeX**](https://yihui.org/tinytex/) — Minimal TeX distribution.

### Writing Tools
- [**VS Code**](https://code.visualstudio.com/) — Primary writing environment.
- [**Obsidian**](https://obsidian.md/) — Knowledge management.

### Diagramming & Graphics
- [**TikZ**](https://ctan.org/pkg/pgf) — LaTeX diagrams.
- [**Mermaid.js**](https://mermaid.js.org/) — Flowcharts and diagrams.
- [**Draw.io (diagrams.net)**](https://www.diagrams.net/) — Diagramming.
- [**Inkscape**](https://inkscape.org/) — Vector illustrations.

## Statistical Computing with R

### Core R Tools
- [**R**](https://www.r-project.org/) — Statistical computing.
- [**tidyverse**](https://www.tidyverse.org/) — Data transformation and visualization.
- [**rmarkdown**](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/) — Dynamic documents.
- [**pagedown**](https://github.com/rstudio/pagedown) — HTML CV and paged documents.

### Use Cases
- SLR automation and data extraction.
- CV generation (Excel → R → pagedown).
- Statistical analysis and visualization.

## Data Visualization & Graphics

### Data Visualization
- [**Matplotlib**](https://matplotlib.org/) — Python plotting.
- [**Seaborn**](https://seaborn.pydata.org/) — Statistical visualization.
- [**ggplot2**](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) — R Grammar of Graphics.
- [**Plotly**](https://plotly.com/) — Interactive plots.
- [**Tableau**](https://www.tableau.com/) — BI dashboards.

### Image & Design Tools
- [**GIMP**](https://www.gimp.org/) — Raster graphics.
- [**LibreOffice Draw**](https://www.libreoffice.org/discover/draw/) — Diagrams.
- [**Microsoft PowerPoint**](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/powerpoint) — Slide design.

## High-Performance Computing

### Cluster Computing
- **PBS Job Scheduler** — Batch jobs (`qsub`, `qstat`).
- **SSH / SCP** — Remote access and file transfer.

### Monitoring Tools
- `htop` — Process monitoring.
- `nvidia-smi` — GPU monitoring.

## Version Control & DevOps

- [**Git**](https://git-scm.com/) — Version control.
- [**GitHub**](https://github.com/) — Code hosting.
- [**GitHub Actions**](https://github.com/features/actions) — CI/CD workflows.
- [**DVC**](https://dvc.org/) — Dataset/model versioning.

## Productivity & System Management

### System Management
- [**Winget**](https://learn.microsoft.com/windows/package-manager/) — Windows package manager.
- [**chezmoi**](https://www.chezmoi.io/) — Dotfile syncing across systems.

### Productivity Tools
- [**Raindrop.io**](https://raindrop.io/) — Bookmark manager.
- [**Microsoft Edge**](https://www.microsoft.com/edge) — Primary browser.
- [**Espanso**](https://espanso.org/) — Text expansion.
- [**Slack**](https://slack.com/) / [**Teams**](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-teams) — Communication tools.

### Cloud Storage
- [**Google Drive**](https://www.google.com/drive/) — Backup and storage.

## Content Creation & Outreach

### Video Production
- [**OBS Studio**](https://obsproject.com/) — Screen recording.
- [**Shotcut**](https://shotcut.org/) — Video editing.
- [**YouTube Studio**](https://studio.youtube.com/) — Channel management (ResearchInfuser).

## Office Suites

- [**LibreOffice Suite**](https://www.libreoffice.org/) — Open-source office tools.
- [**Microsoft Office Suite**](https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365) — Word, Excel, PowerPoint.

## Automation & Scripting

- [**Google Apps Script**](https://developers.google.com/apps-script) — Timetable automation and workflows.
- **Excel → R → pagedown** — Automated CV pipeline.
- **HTML / CSS / JavaScript** — Website enhancements and automations.
